channel.title: Guitar Hero!
channel.description: ahhh....guitar hero. man do i love guitar hero lol. just wondring if anyone else has played guitar hero for ps2? i bought it and was hooked on it for likie a week. and when i say hooked i mean like almost nonstop playing(well not nonstop lol, but a [b][u]WHOLE[/u][/b] lot of playin). im still addicted to it but just not as much as when i first got it. i thinks its awesome!!!! so does any1 else like it?

item.title: Guitar Hero!
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

man no1 else has played it? hmm maybe this is the wrong section to put it in[br][size=1]Posted at: July 10, 2006, 07:22:38 PM[/size][hr]hmm well ill post in the talk about other games section. thats prolly where i shoulda anyways

item.title: Guitar Hero!
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

[quote=“Omfgurweird, post:6, topic:4598”]Shit, that game is so fun, i don’t care what anyone says. I play drums, and mess around on my friends guitar. That game is just fun, because you don’t have to be good at guitar to be good at it.
Top Score := Unsung on Expert, 345,000, 98% Notes Hit. Cant member exactly, it was around that, give or take 1k.[/quote]

dam dude, u must be real good. try bark at the moon on expert. i failed the song in like 10 seconds lol. and iv played the guitar for about 4 years and i still think the game is the shiz

Read full topic

item.title: Guitar Hero!
item.dc:creator: @Omfgurweird Omfgurweird
item.description:
@Omfgurweird wrote:

Shit, that game is so fun, i don’t care what anyone says. I play drums, and mess around on my friends guitar. That game is just fun, because you don’t have to be good at guitar to be good at it.
Top Score := Unsung on Expert, 345,000, 98% Notes Hit. Cant member exactly, it was around that, give or take 1k.

Read full topic

Guitar hero is the shit. Being unable to play any musical instrument, It is fun to play along to some fun songs. It appears every real musician hates it though
